prompt: Technical illustration of a modern craftsman workbench with 5 specialized development stations arranged in a semi-circular workflow. Clean, professional style with blue and purple color scheme. Center shows a sleek workbench surface. Station 1 top-left: Code Review Station with large magnifying glass examining code lines and checklist clipboard icon, labeled Code Review. Station 2 top-center-left: Refactoring Station with circular transformation arrows showing code reorganization, labeled Refactoring. Station 3 top-center: Debugging Station with stylized bug icon and crosshairs target overlay, labeled Debugging. Station 4 top-center-right: Testing Station with test tube inside a shield with checkmark, labeled Testing. Station 5 top-right: Git Integration Station with elegant branch and merge flow diagram with nodes and connecting lines, labeled Git Integration. All stations connected by flowing curved arrows showing integrated workflow. Bottom tagline reads The right tool for every development task in elegant typography. Modern flat design with subtle gradients, light gray background, proper margins ensuring all content is fully visible. Technical documentation style suitable for educational course materials.
